posts.title: docker快速搭建GO开发环境
posts.text: 拉取镜像1docker pull golang 配置docker-compose123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627version: '3.5'# 网络配置networks: backend: driver: ${NETWORKS_DRIVER}# 服务容器配置services: golang: image: golang:latest container_name: mygo environment: # 设置环境变量 - TZ="Asia/Shanghai" volumes: # 设置挂载目录 - $PWD/code:/usr/src/code # 引用 .env 配置中 CODE_PATH_HOST 变量，将宿主机上代码存放的目录挂载到容器中 /usr/src/code 目录 ports: # 设置端口映射 - "8081:8081" working_dir: /usr/src/code stdin_open: true # 打开标准输入，可以接受外部输入 tty: true networks: - backend restart: always # 指定容器退出后的重启策略为始终重启 启动docker1cd /tmp/demo && docker-compose up -d 编写测试文件1cd /tmp/demo/code && mkdir ch1 && cd ch1 && go mod init ch1 && touch main.go 12# 编写go文件cd /tmp/demo/code/ch1 && vim main.go 12345678910111213141516171819package mainimport ( "fmt" "io" "log" "net/http")func main() { http.HandleFunc("/", func(w http.ResponseWriter, r *http.Request) { _, _ = io.WriteString(w, "hello1") }) fmt.Println("server starting...") err := http.ListenAndServe(":8081", nil) if err != nil { log.Fatal("server start failed") }} 12# 启动服务cd /private/tmp/demo && docker exec -it mygo go run ch1/main.go 123# 测试~/WorkSpace/boke  curl 127.0.0.1:8081hello1%
